topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e799a1636872470b990100#post_53e799a1636872470b990100
Skyrim, Dark souls 1 and 2, TF2 and some other things.

TF2 is free so I just have to install it.

Skyrim I've been wanting to play but even though my brother already has the game and it's installed to _this_ computer already I believe it's only registered to _his_ account so I have to buy it again for my self which sucks.

Dark souls I've been wanting to get in for some time now.

And I cant really think of anything else at the moment?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
Well shit; some guy in Missouri got his ass shot off by cops even though he put up no resistance or nothing and was shot a ton of times.

If you're wondering what I'm talking about a African American 18 year old a couple miles out of St Louis and was sitting on the concrete handcuffed and the police officer in question opened fire numerous times without provocation.  If it were one shot you might argue it was a accidental firing, but the cop riddling his body with bullets reloading and firing again there's no way in hell that was a accident.

That cop needs to go to prison; just cause you're wearing a badge doesn't mean you're immune from the law.


. . . Shit like this is why no one trusts cops.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e79bb9636872119a5d0100#post_53e79bb9636872119a5d0100
This is why I keep my ass inside.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
A bit of a update; there's a couple conflicting reports but the thing that does seem to have had happened and several reports share the same story is that he was trying to make a run for it.

Honestly I don't trust the police on this one cause the police report says that he was shot in the police car and "only" once when he was in fact shot on the concrete and riddled with numerous bullets.

The cop responsible needs to go to prison cause it's obvious he's a dirty cop.
